title: My First Ever Blog Post
body: Is this the beginning of my blossoming and deeply fulfilling blogging career? Or perhaps this is the start of the new Me I've always been dreaming of. Or is this just me trying to fill out the "blog" section of my portfolio website, in all its dark-theme glory? Whatever this is, I'm pretty happy that I'm just doing something instead of over-planning and overthinking. Hopefully this is the start of me not being weighed down by my own goals and the pressure I put on myself to reach them. Hopefully I don't come back and edit this post and leave it is, however it may sound the next day. Hopefully this is the start of me just doing.
